text: tatha yahoodiyon ne kaha ki eesaeeyon ke paas kuchh nahin aur eesaeeyon ne kaha ki yahoodiyon ke paas kuchh nahin hai. jabaki ve dharm pustak[1] padhate hain. isee jaisee baat unhonne bhee kahee, jinake paas dharm pustak ka koee gyaan[2] nahin. ye jis vishay mein vibhed kar rahe hain, usaka nirnay allaah pralay ke din unake beech kar dega
